### size

>  size (repo:str)

*Returns the size in GB of a HuggingFace Dataset.*

``` python
!echo $HF_ENDPOINT
```

    https://hf-mirror.com

``` python
size("tglcourse/CelebA-faces-cropped-128")
```

    '5.49 GB'
